content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (22.5, -7.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at Position (22.5, -7.5)
- Boiler at Position (20.5, -4.0)
- Offshore Pump at Position (4.5, -10.5)
- Pipe Group connecting these components, starting at Position (20.5, -10.5) and ending at Position (20.5, -5.5)

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace at Position (0.0, 0.0) with a fuel supply of coal
- Stone Furnace at Position (2.0, 0.0) with a fuel supply of coal

### Copper Plate Production Facility at Position (5.0, 5.0)
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace at Position (5.0, 5.0) with a fuel supply of coal

### Copper Cable Factory at Position (10.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling Machine at Position (10.5, 0.5)
- Inserter at Position (7.5, 5.5) feeding copper plates
- Belt Group connecting the furnace at Position (5.0, 5.0) to the Assembling Machine at Position (10.5, 0.5)

### Iron Ore Mining Site at Position (-11.0, 20.0)
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (-11.0, 20.0)
- Wooden Chest at Position (-11.5, 18.5) for storing mined iron ore

### Transport Belt System at Position (10.5, 5.5)
Consists of:
- Belt Group at Position (10.5, 5.5) with inputs and outputs
- Inserter at Position (9.5, 5.5) interacting with the belt system
- Wooden Chest at Position (8.5, 5.5) storing copper plates

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors When Reconnecting Transport Belts
- Ensure that the transport belts are aligned correctly and have a valid path for connection. Verify that the start and end positions are not blocked or misaligned.

### Inserter Waiting for Source Items
- Ensure that the inserter has access to the required source items. Check that the source entity is correctly positioned and has the necessary items available.

### Inserter Waiting for Space in Destination
- Clear any blockages on the transport belt to ensure the inserter can drop items. Regularly check and maintain the belt to prevent congestion.

### Boiler Out of Fuel
- Regularly check fuel levels in boilers and ensure they are refueled promptly to maintain continuous operation.

### Assembling Machine Missing Ingredients
- Ensure that the assembling machine has a constant supply of required ingredients. Verify that the input sources are functioning correctly and are not depleted.
